HOUSE BILL/RESOLUTION HISTORY
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02592
ADOPTED AS RESOLUTION NO. HR00206
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING THE METROPOLITAN WATERWORKS AND SEWERAGE SYSTEM (MWSS), NATIONAL WATER RESOURCES BOARD (NWRB), LOCAL WATER UTILITIES ADMINISTRATION (LWUA), DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE (DA), NATIONAL IRRIGATION ADMINISTRATION (NIA), MANILA WATER COMPANY, INC. (MWCI), AND MAYNILAD WATER SERVICES, INC. (MWSI), TO IMMEDIATELY FORM A TECHNICAL WORKING GROUP TO IDENTIFY GAPS AND RECOMMEND ACTIONS TO ACCELERATE THE IMPLEMENTATION AND EXECUTION OF EXISTING MITIGATING STRATEGIES IN ORDER TO AVERT THE RECURRENCE OF WATER SHORTAGE IN METRO MANILA AND ENSURE THE PROVISION OF A SUSTAINABLE SUPPLY OF CLEAN AND SAFE WATER TO ITS CITIZENS NOW AND IN THE FUTURE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MACAPAGAL ARROYO, GLORIA, CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE", SACDALAN, JESUS NONATO, FERNANDO, BAYANI F., GO, MARK O., AGGABAO, MA. LOURDES R., MARCOLETA, RODANTE D., SUAREZ, DANILO E.
DATE FILED : 2019-06-03
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITTEE REPORT NO. 01328
SUBMITTED ON 2019-06-03
SUBMITTED BY: GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION, PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS
RECOMMENDATIONS: Recommending its approval, in substitution of House Resolution No. 2547
SUBSTITUTED BILLS: HR02547
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2019-06-03
DATE INCLUDED IN OB: 2019-06-03
SECOND READING INFORMATION
RESOLUTION ADOPTED ON SECOND READING : 2019-06-04
NEW RESOLUTION NO. : HR00206
